about_the_game:
Introducing a new DLC expansion for Memory Quickie! Dive into a fresh and vibrant world of fruity fun with the 'Fruits & Vegetables' expansion pack.

Embark on a tantalizing journey through a cornucopia of colors and flavors as you match tiles adorned with an array of delicious fruits and nutritious vegetables. From succulent strawberries to crisp carrots, challenge your memory and concentration with this delightful new set of tiles.

Expand your gameplay experience and add a healthy dose of variety to your tile-matching adventures. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to the game, the 'Fruits & Vegetables' DLC promises hours of wholesome entertainment for the whole family.

Get ready to slice, dice, and match your way to victory in this juicy new addition to Memory Quickie!
detailed_description:
Introducing a new DLC expansion for Memory Quickie! Dive into a fresh and vibrant world of fruity fun with the 'Fruits & Vegetables' expansion pack.

Embark on a tantalizing journey through a cornucopia of colors and flavors as you match tiles adorned with an array of delicious fruits and nutritious vegetables. From succulent strawberries to crisp carrots, challenge your memory and concentration with this delightful new set of tiles.

Expand your gameplay experience and add a healthy dose of variety to your tile-matching adventures. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to the game, the 'Fruits & Vegetables' DLC promises hours of wholesome entertainment for the whole family.

Get ready to slice, dice, and match your way to victory in this juicy new addition to Memory Quickie!
name: Memory Quickie - Fruits & Vegetables

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz x64
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz x64
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: Dive into a fresh and vibrant world of fruity fun with the 'Fruits & Vegetables' expansion pack.
